Articles.Content: Here is a write-up and video I did for the Kernel Critic website on how to dock in 6 simple and straightforward steps!

It's good to see a tutorial with the more fuel efficient method. Most tutorials have you stop relative velocity at your closest approach and aim straight at the target for another burn, but that's just wasting momentum you already had. I say teach them right the first time.

Thanks man!
